content.text: Welcome! Let's learn how to ask for help in a clothing store in Spain. A clothing store is 'una tienda de ropa'.

data.tip: The stress is on the first syllable, 'sué'.

content.title: Asking for Assistance
content.setting: You are in a clothing store and see a shop assistant. You want to ask for help finding a sweater.

conversation_flow.title: Say you are looking for a blue sweater

extract_info.user_size: Extract the size the user states, e.g., 'la mediana'

content.text: Great start! Now you need to try on the clothes. The fitting rooms are called 'los probadores'.

data.tip: The 'r' sound is soft, and the stress is on the 'do' syllable.

content.title: Trying it On
content.setting: The assistant has brought you the sweater. You need to find the fitting rooms and check the size.

conversation_flow.title: Ask where the fitting rooms are
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Aquí tiene. Un suéter azul, talla {user_size}.

conversation_flow.title: Say the sweater is too big
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Están al fondo, a la derecha. ... ¿Qué tal?

conversation_flow.title: Ask for it in another size
Acknowledge the assistant's help
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Sí, voy a buscar una talla más pequeña.

content.text: Time to make a decision! 'Me lo llevo' is a great phrase that means 'I'll take it'.

data.tip: The 'j' in Spanish sounds like the 'h' in 'hello'.

content.title: Making the Purchase
content.setting: You have tried on the new size and it fits perfectly. Now you are ready to buy the sweater.

conversation_flow.title: Say the new size is perfect and you'll take it
Ask if you can exchange it
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Puede pagar en la caja, allí. ... (at the checkout) ... Hola. ¿Algo más?

conversation_flow.title: Finish the conversation
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Sí, con el ticket tiene 30 días. Son 25 euros.
